src:
20 Resep masakan praktis sehari-hari, enak, mudah, & murah
Masakan sederhana bisa menjadi menu favorit keluarga.
01 Nov 2019, 23:59 by Lola Lolita
Brilio.net - Sebagai seorang ibu atau yang hobi masak, menyediakan masakan lezat untuk keluarga merupakan hal yang menyenangkan bagi mereka. Tidak hanya mengurus rumah saja, tetapi juga harus memastikan kebutuhan gizi dan makanan yang dikonsumsi anak anak dan suami harus terjaga.
Sekarang ini memang dengan mudah bisa membeli masakan jadi dan tanpa harus repot untuk memasaknya terlebih dahulu. Namun beda bagi mereka yang memang ingin memberikan yang terbaik untuk keluarganya. Pasalnya memasak sendiri jauh lebih higienis dan bisa menyesuaikan sesuai selera keluarga.
Memasak tidak harus yang mewah, terkadang masakan sederhana bisa menjadi menu favorit keluarga lho. Terlebih jika kamu tidak hanya bertugas mengurus rumah tangga saja, tapi juga memiliki pekerjaan lain yang harus kamu selesaikan. Maka kamu harus memutar otak untuk memasak makanan sederhana namun disukai anggota keluarga.
Nah buat kamu yang sibuk, berikut ini beberapa resep masakan praktis sehari-hari, dijamin keluarga suka dan bakal nagih. Seperti apa? Berikut lansiran brilio.net dari berbagai sumber, Jumat (1/11).

1. Mi goreng sosis bakso.



foto: Instagram/@indoresepgram

Bahan-bahan:- 1 lembar panjang mi telur kering- 1 butir telur- 2 buah sosis, iris- Bakso, belah dua- Sawi, potong- 3 siung bawang putih, haluskan- 2 butir bawang merah, haluskan- 3 sdm kecap manis- 1 sdm saus tiram- 1 sdt kecap ikan- 1 sdt kecap asin- 1 sdt kaldu jamur- Gula garam dan merica, secukupnya
Cara memasak:- Rebus mi, tiriskan. Campurkan kecap manis dan sedikit minyak ke dalam mi. Aduk rata- Panaskan sedikit minyak. Orak-arik telur, sosis dan bakso. Tumis bumbu halus, dan masukkan semua bumbu. Tambahkan sedikit air. Masukkan mi dan sawi. Aduk hingga tercampur rata. Sajikan.

2. Balado hijau teri.



foto: Instagram/@galleryresepftv

Bahan-bahan:- 250 gr cabai hijau besar- 1 ons cabai rawit hijau- 6 tomat hijau ukuran kecil- 8 butir bawang merah- 2 siung bawang putih- 1 jeruk nipis- 2 lembar daun jeruk- 1 lembar daun salam- 1 ons teri goreng- Garam dan gula pasir
Cara membuat:- Didihkan air, tambahkan sejumput garam lalu masukkan cabai, bawang merah dan tomat, setelah layu tiriskan, ulek kasar dengan bawang putih mentah- Panaskan sedikit minyak goreng, tumis sambal, daun jeruk dan daun salam, bumbui dengan gula dan garam, kalau mau pakai kaldu bubuk- Setelah dingin, campurkan dengan teri goreng
Tips biar sambal hijau warnanya cantik dan agak hitam- Sebelum cabai diulek ditetesi air perasan jeruk nipis- Air untuk merebus cabai didihkan dulu, tambah garam baru masukkan cabai dan lain-lain jadi warnanya tetep cantik- Sajikan.

3. Ikan salem siram cabai pete.



foto: Instagram/@masakanikan

Bahan-bahan:- 4 buah ikan salem ukuran sedang- 300 cc air- Minyak untuk menumis dan menggoreng- 2 sdm saus tiram- 2 sdm kecap manis- 3 lembar daun salam- Lada garam secukupnya
Bumbu iris:- 8 butir bawang merah- 5 siung bawang putih- 5 buah cabai merah besar- 5 buah cabai hijau besar- 10 buah cabai rawit merah- 1 genggam pete- 1 ruas lengkuas- 1 ruas jahe
Cara memasak:- Goreng ikan salem hingga matang, tiriskan- Tumis semua bumbu bersama daun salam hingga harum. Masukkan air, tambahkan saus tiram, kecap, lada, garam.- Setelah mendidih, masak sebentar saja agar bumbu tetap segar tidak terlalu layu- Susun salem goreng di atas piring, siram dengan bumbu. Siap disajikan.

4. Udang saus padang.



foto: Instagram/@galerimasakanindonesia

Bahan-bahan:- Udang kupas- 6 butir bawang merah- 3 siung bawang putih- seruas jahe- 10 buah cabai merah besar- 2 sdm saus tomat- 2 sdm saus pedas- kecap manis- garam- gula
Cara masak:- Haluskan cabai, bawang merah, bawang putih dan jahe- Tumis bumbu yang sudah dihaluskan, sampai harum, masukkan udang yang sudah dikupas, aduk rata, tambahkan saus, kecap, gula garam secukupnya, aduk rata, tambahkan air sedikit, aduk rata koreksi rasa- Masak hingga bumbu meresap lalu angkat dan sajikan.

5. Tumis bunga pepaya.



foto: Instagram/@galerimasakanindonesia

Bahan-bahan:- 1 mangkuk bunga pepaya, rebus dengan beberapa lembar daun jambu biji (untuk menguragi rasa pahit)- 1 genggam ikan teri, goreng garing- 2 siung bawang putih, iris tipis- 3 butir bawang merah, iris tipis- 4 buah/sesuai selera cabai rawit iris serong- 4 buah/sesuai selera cabai merah iris serong- Secukupnya garam, penyedap rasa dan gula- Seruas jari lengkuas, memarkan- 1 lembar daun salam
Cara memasak:- Tumis bawang putih, bawang merah, cabai, lengkuas dan daun salam sampai harum- Masukkan bunga pepaya kemudian aduk rata, tambahkan sedikit air- Bumbui garam, penyedap rasa dan gula- Masukkan ikan teri dan aduk rata lagi- Koreksi rasa, angkat dan siap dihidangkan dengan nasi hangat.

6. Balado sarden terong.



foto: Instagram/@susan_gracia

Bahan-bahan:- 2 kaleng kecil sarden- 2 buah terong, potong- 2 papan pete- 1 buah bawang bombay, iris- 7 cabai rawit merah, iris serong- 3 lembar daun jeruk, iris tipis
Bumbu ulek kasar:- 6 siung bawang merah- 10 cabai merah keriting- 5 cabai rawit merah
Cara membuat:- Tumis bumbu ulek dan daun jeruk hingga harum- Lalu masukkan sarden, pete dan terong, aduk rata- Terakhir garam, bawang bombai dan irisan cabai rawit, aduk rata. Angkat dan sajikan.

7. Sosis telur asam manis.



foto: Instagram/@masak.menu_sehat

Bahan-bahan:- 1 pack sosis chicken breakfast- 2 butir telur kocok- 1/2 buah bawang bombai potong-potong- 1 siung bawang putih cincang halus- 3 sdm saus tomat- 1/2 sdm saus tiram- 1/2 sdm gula pasir- 1 sdt maizena larutkan dengan sedikit air- Merica,garam- Air secukupnya
Cara memasak:- Kerat-kerat sosis lalu goreng- Panaskan minyak goreng, tuang kocokan telur lalu bikin orak arik, angkat dan sisihkan- Tumis bawang putih dan bawang bombai hingga harum, masukkan saus tomat, saus tiram, aduk rata lalu tuangi air secukupnya- Beri gula, garam, merica bubuk, aduk rata dan koreksi rasanya, jika rasa sduah pas tuang larutan maizena, aduk rata- Masukkan sosis dan telur, aduk hingga rata, angkat dan sajikan.

8. Nasi goreng bakso.



foto: Instagram/@yulianatunggadewi_18

Bahan-bahan:- 2 piring nasi suhu ruang- 2 batang daun bawang- 1 wortel potong korek- sawi potong kecil- 6 bakso potong tipis- 2 butir telur- 2 sdm kecap manis- 1,5 sdt garam- 2 sdt gula pasir- 1/2 sdt merica bubuk
Bumbu halus:- 2 siung bawang putih- 5 butir bawang merah- 5 cabai rawit sesuai selera
Cara membuat:- Tumis bumbu halus sampai wangi, lalu masukkan wortel, aduk rata- masukkan telur, lalu orak arik, masukkan bakso dan sawi, aduk rata- masukkan nasi beri kecap, garam, gula dan merica aduk rata sampai matang, sesaat sebelum di angkat beri daun bawang, koreksi rasa, angkat dan hidangkan.

9. Oseng tempe.



foto: Instagram/@resep.masakan_enak

Bahan-bahan:- 1 papah tempe- Segenggam kemangi- 3 butir bawang merah- 3 siung bawang putih- 3 biji rawit merah- Kecap manis- Gula dan garam secukupnya
Cara memasak:- Potong dadu tempe, goreng setengah kering- Tumis bumbu, tambahkan gula dan garam, masukkan tempe aduk rata- Tambahkan kemangi dan kecap manis- Masak sampai bumbu merata.

10. Sambal terasi.



foto: Instagram/@masak.menu_sehat

Bahan sambal:- 7 cabai keriting merah- 7 cabai keriting hijau- 5 cabai rawit merah- 5 cabai rawit hijau- 3 butir bawang merah- 2 siung bawang putih- 1/2 tomat merah- 1/2 keping terasi- Garam dan gula secukupnya- Jeruk nipis secukupnya- Minyak goreng secukupnya
Cara memasak:- Tumis semua bahan sambal terasi hingga cukup layu- Pindahkan bahan sambal ke ulekan, tambahkan sedikit minyak bekas menumis- Ulek bahan sambal hingga sesuai dengan selera- Tambahkan garam dan gula, koreksi rasa- Terakhir tambahkan air perasan jeruk nipis.

11. Cah kangkung bakso.



foto: Instagram/@video.resepmasakan

Bahan-bahan:- 1 ikat kangkung- 5 bakso sapi- 1 buah tomat
Bumbu uleg kasar:- 4 siung bawang putih- 1 butir kemiri- 10 buah cabai rawit atau sesuai selera
Tambahan:- Saus tiram- Penyedap jamur- Garam
Cara memasak:- Petik kangkung, cuci bersih dan tiriskan- Bakso belah suka suka- Panaskan minyak goreng lalu tumis bumbu uleg dan potongan tomat sampai harum lalu masukkan kangkung dan baso, tumis cepat bumbui saus tiram, penyedap jamur sedikit garam, tuang air panas secukupnya, tumis merata, tes rasaangkat- Sajikan.

12. Udang pedas manis.



foto: Instagram/@galerimasakanindonesia

Bahan-bahan:- 600 gr udang, kupas kulitnya- 2 siung bawang putih- 1 buah bawang bombayi- 2 buah cabai merah keriting- 2 buah cabai hijau keriting- 1 batang daun bawang, ambil daunnya sajaBahan saus:- 2 sdm saus sambal- 4 sdm saus tomat- 1 sdm saori saus tiram- 1 1/2 sdm kecap manis- Secukupnya garam- Secubit lada
Cara memasak:- Bersihkan udang, buang kulit dan kepalanya- Iris halus bawang putih, cincang bawang bombai- Siapkan api, tumis bawang putih dan bawang bombai hingga harum kemudian masukkan udang tumis udang hingga berubah warna- Masukkan semua bahan saus, garam dan lada. Setelah hampir matang masukkan irisan cabai merah, hijau dan daun bawang. Aduk rata dan koreksi rasa- Sajikan.

13. Cah toge tahu ikan asin.



foto: Instagram/@indoresepgram

Bahan-bahan:- Toge panjang- Kacang panjang- Tahu putih- Daun bawang- Ikan asin- Tetelan sapi- Kaldu jamur- Merica- Saos tiram- Gula pasir
Bumbu iris:- 4 butir bawang merah- 3 siung bawang putih- 5 cabai rawit merah- 1 tomat merah
Cara memasak:- Goreng tahu yang sudah dipotong dadu setengah matang, sisihkan- Lanjutkan dengan menggoreng ikan asin, sisihkan- Tumis bumbu iris sampai harum lalu masukkan tetelan sapi, tahu dan kacang panjang- Boleh tambah air sedikit saja- Beri bumbu seperti merica, kaldu jamur, saos tiram dan gula pasir- Terakhir masukkan toge, ikan asin dan daun bawang, masak sebentar lalu angkat dan sajikan.

14. Oseng sawi jagung manis.



foto: Instagram/@menu.harini

Bahan-bahan:- 1 ikat atau sekitar 6 tangkai sawi, potong-potong- 1 buah jagung manis, serut- 3 siung bawang putih cincang- 1 sdm ebi halus- Secukupnya cabai iris sering- Gula, garam dan kaldu bubuk secukupnya- Air secukupnya
Cara memasak:- Tumis bawang putih dan ebi sampai harum, masukkan cabai, jagung dan air- Tunggu sampai jagung empuk/cukup matang- Masukkan sawi, tambah garam gula dan kaldu bubuk- Aduk rata tunggu sawi layu, matikan kompor- Sajikan pada mangkuk/piring.

15. Tongkol jontor.



foto: Instagram/@masak.menu_sehat

Bahan-bahan:- Tongkol, goreng sebentar- 2 cm jahe, geprek- 2 lembar daun salam- 2 lembar daun bawang, iris- Garam, gula, kaldu bubuk secukupnya- Air secangkir
Bumbu halus:- 10 siung bawang merah- 8 siung bawang putih- 10 cabai merah besar- 10 cabai merah keriting- 30 cabai rawit merah- 1 buah tomat
Cara memasak:- Tumis bumbu halus, jahe, daun bawang, daun salam sampai wangi. Setelah itu bumbui dengan garam, gula, dan kaldu bubuk. Tes rasa- Setelah bumbu dirasa pas masukkan tongkol dan air secangkir. Aduk rata. Masak sampai air surut dan bumbu meresap. Angkat dan sajikan.

16. Terong kecap.



foto: Instagram/@resep.masakan.sayur

Bahan-bahan:- 500 gr terong lalap, buang tangkainya cuci dan potong-potong- 50 gr teri medan goreng kering- 1 ruas lengkuas geprek- 1 lembar daun jeruk- 1 sdm saos tiram- 2 sdm kecap manis- Gula, garam, dan penyedap jamur, secukupnya- Air secukupnya- Minyak untuk menumis secukupnya
Bumbu iris:- 5 siung besar bawang putih- 7 butir besar bawang merah- 20 cabai rawit/sesuai selera- 2 buah cabai merah besar- 2 buah cabai hijau besar- 1 buah tomat
Cara memasak:- Tumis bumbu iris beserta lengkuas dan daun jeruk hingga harum, masukkan pula terong lalu tambahkan sedikit air- Beri saus tiram, kecap manis, gula, garam, penyedap, masak hingga terong layu/matang- Menjelang diangkat masukkan teri, aduk rata koreksi rasa. matikan dan sajikan.

17. Terong sambal teri pete.



foto: Instagram/@resep.masakan.sayur

Bahan-bahan:- 1 buah terong muda- Pete secukupnya- Teri goreng secukupnya- Garam dan gula secukupnya
Bahan halus:- 5 butir bawang merah- 2 siung bawang putih- 5 buah cabai merah- 3 buah cabai rawit- 1 sdt fiber creme- 1/2 sdm udang kering rendam dulu
Cara memasak:- Bersihkan terong potong menjadi 4 bagian- Panaskan minyak yang banyak sampai benar-benar panas, goreng terong sebentar angkat tiriskan- Panaskan sedikit minyak di wajan tumis bahan halus sampai wangi kemudian masukkan garam dan gula secukupnya- Tambahkan pete dan terong aduk sebentar angkat- Taburi ikan teri goreng sajikan selagi panas.

18. Udang kriuk gurih.



foto: Instagram/@resepudang

Bahan-bahan:- 450 gr udang- 1 sdm full fiber creme- 100 gr tepung serbaguna- 3 sdm maizena- 1 butir putih telur- 2 siung bawang putih parut- Lada, garam secukupnya- Minyak goreng
Cara memasak:- Bersihkan udang sisakan ekor belah punggung melebar dan buang kotorannya- Aduk rata udang dengan bawang putih, lada dan sedikit garam marinated selama 30 menit- Kocok putih telur tambahkan 2 sdm air es dan fiber creme- Aduk rata tepung serbaguna dan maizena- Gulingkan udang dalam tepung tipis saja, lalu celup dalam kocokan telur lalu gulingkan lagi dalam tepung dengan sedikit diremas-remas, lakukan sampai habis lalu goreng dalam minyak panas dengan api sedang sampai golden brown- Angkat dan tiriskan- Sajikan dengan cocolan sambal.

19. Telur sambal.



foto: Instagram/@resepkreasirakyat

Bahan-bahan:- 4 buah telur ayam, rebus matang lalu goreng hingga berkulit
Bahan sambal (cincang kasar):- 2 siung bawang putih- 8 butir bawang merah- 2 buah cabai merah besar- 10 buah cabai rawit
Bahan lain:- 1 lembar daun jeruk, buang tulangnya- 1 buah tomat iris- 1/2 sdt terasi matang- Gula, garam, kaldu bubuk secukupnya
Cara membuat:- Tumis bahan sambal bersama terasi dan daun jeruk hingga harum dan matang, beri air secukupnya- Masukkan telur dan irisan tomat, bumbui dengan gula, garam dan kaldu bubuk, koreksi rasanya, masak hingga kuah asat- Taburi daun bawang, siap disajikan.

20. Tumis jamur tiram.



foto: Instagram/@menu.harini

Bahan-bahan:- 200 gr jamur tiram- 5 helai kacang panjang, potong serong- 4 siung bawang putih, cincang halus- Air secukupnya- Minyak utuk menumis
Bumbu:- Garam- Gula- Penyedap jamur
Cara memasak:- Panaskan minyak dalam wajan, tumis bawang putih hingga harum- Masukkan kacang panjang, tumis sebentar, masukkan jamur tiram lalu tumis kembali. Beri sedikit air.- Masukkan Bumbu (takaran disesuaikan dengan selera masing-masing). Aduk rata. Lalu tes cicip- Tumis beberapa saat. Matikan api. Angkat dan sajikan dgn nasi hangat.

RECOMMENDED
13 Resep makanan yang mengandung protein, enak dan sehat 10 Resep makanan khas Papua, unik, enak dan gampang dibuat 5 Cara membuat bandeng presto rumahan, gurih dan lezat 9 Resep dan cara membuat sosis, enak dan menggugah selera 6 Cara membuat saus karamel mudah, enak, dan antigosong
text:
20 Practical daily recipes, tasty, easy & cheap
Simple dishes can be a family favorite menu.
Nov 1, 2019, 23:59 by Lola Lolita
Brilio.net - As a mother or a hobby cook, providing delicious food for the family is fun for them. Not only taking care of the house, but also must ensure the nutritional needs and food consumed by children and husband must be maintained.
Nowadays it can easily buy finished dishes and without having to bother to cook them first. But it is different for those who really want to provide the best for their families. Because cooking alone is much more hygienic and can adjust according to family tastes.
Cooking does not have to be fancy, sometimes simple dishes can be a family favorite menu. Especially if you are not only in charge of taking care of the household, but also have other work that you must complete. Then you have to rack your brain to cook simple but family-like foods.
So for you who are busy, here are some practical recipes everyday, guaranteed a family likes and will collect. Like what? The following alerts brilio.net from various sources, Friday (1/11).

1. Meatball sausage fried noodles.



photo: Instagram / @ indoresepgram

Ingredients: - 1 long sheet of dried egg noodles - 1 egg - 2 sausages, sliced - Meatballs, halved - mustard, cut - 3 cloves of garlic, puree - 2 grains of onion, puree - 3 tablespoons soy sauce - 1 tbsp oyster sauce - 1 tsp fish sauce - 1 tsp soy sauce - 1 tsp mushroom broth - Salt sugar and pepper, to taste
How to cook: - Boil noodles, drain. Mix sweet soy sauce and a little oil into the noodles. Mix well - Heat a little oil. Scrambled eggs, sausages and meatballs. Sauté the spices, and add all the spices. Add a little water. Add noodles and mustard greens. Stir until evenly mixed. Serve.

2. Green anchovy balado.



photo: Instagram / @ galleryresepftv

Ingredients: - 250 g large green chili - 1 ounce green cayenne pepper - 6 small green tomatoes - 8 red onions - 2 cloves of garlic - 1 lime - 2 leaves of orange - 1 sheet of bay leaves - 1 ounce of anchovies fried-Salt and sugar
How to make: - Boil water, add a pinch of salt, then add chili, onion and tomatoes, after wilting drain, coarsely rub with raw garlic- Heat a little cooking oil, stir-fry chili sauce, lime leaves and bay leaves, season with sugar and salt, If you want to use powdered stock, after it cools down, mix it with fried anchovies
Tips so that the green chili color is pretty and somewhat black- Before chili is pressed with lime juice drops- Water to boil the chili boil first, add new salt and add chili peppers etc. so the color is still pretty- Serve.

3. Salmon sprinkled with banana peppers.



photo: Instagram / @ cuisine

Ingredients: - 4 medium size salmon - 300 cc water - Oil for sauteing and frying - 2 tablespoons oyster sauce - 2 tablespoons sweet soy sauce - 3 bay leaves - Salt pepper to taste
Sliced seasoning: - 8 red onions - 5 cloves of garlic - 5 large red chilies - 5 large green chilies - 10 red cayenne peppers - 1 handful of 1 ginger-1 segment of ginger-1 segment of ginger
How to cook: - Fried salmon until cooked, drain- Saute all the spices with bay leaves until fragrant. Add water, add oyster sauce, soy sauce, pepper, salt.- After boiling, cook for a while so that the seasoning stays fresh and not too heavy. Arrange the fried salmon on a plate, flush with the seasoning. Ready to be served.

4. Prawn sauce.



photo: Instagram / @ galerimasakanindonesia

Ingredients: - Peeled Shrimp - 6 Onions - 3 Cloves Garlic - As Broad As Ginger - 10 Large Red Chilies - 2 Tbsp Tomato Sauce - 2 Tbsp Spicy Sauce - Sweet Soy Sauce - Salt-Sugar
How to cook: - Blend the chili, onion, garlic and ginger. Saute the seasoning that has been mashed, until fragrant, add the shrimp that have been peeled, stir well, add the sauce, soy sauce, salt sugar to taste, stir well, add a little water, stir Evenly correct the flavor - Cook until the spices are soaked then remove and serve.

5. Saute papaya flowers.



photo: Instagram / @ galerimasakanindonesia

Ingredients: - 1 bowl of papaya flowers, boiled with a few guava leaves (to reduce the bitter taste) - 1 handful of anchovies, fried crispy - 2 cloves of garlic, thinly sliced - 3 grains of red onion, thinly sliced - 4 pieces / according to taste chili sliced cayenne- 4 pieces / according to taste chili sliced red chili- Insufficient salt, flavoring and sugar- Seruas galangal fingers, memarkan- 1 sheet of bay leaves
How to cook: - Saute garlic, onion, chili, galangal and bay leaves until fragrant- Add papaya flowers then stir well, add a little water- Season salt, flavorings and sugar- Enter anchovies and stir well again- Correct the taste, Remove and ready to be served with warm rice.

6. Balado sardine eggplant.



photo: Instagram / @ susan_gracia

Ingredients: - 2 small cans of sardines - 2 eggplants, cut into pieces - 2 planks - 1 onion, sliced - 7 red cayenne peppers, sliced sliced - 3 pieces of orange leaves, thinly sliced
Coarse ulek seasonings: - 6 cloves shallots - 10 curly red chilies - 5 red cayenne peppers
How to make: - Saute the ulek spices and orange leaves until fragrant- Then add sardines, bananas and eggplants, stir thoroughly- Finally salt, onion and sliced cayenne pepper, stir well. Remove and serve.

7. Sweet and sour egg sausages.



photo: Instagram/@masak.menu_sehat

Ingredients: - 1 pack of sausage chicken breakfast - 2 eggs beaten - 1/2 fruit onions cut into pieces - 1 clove finely chopped garlic - 3 tablespoons tomato sauce - 1/2 tablespoon oyster sauce - 1/2 tablespoon sugar sand- 1 teaspoon cornstarch dissolve with a little water- Pepper, salt- Water to taste
How to cook: - Sausage chips and frying - Heat cooking oil, pour egg beaters then make scrambled, remove and set aside - Saute garlic and onion until fragrant, add tomato sauce, oyster sauce, stir well then pour enough water- Give sugar, salt, pepper, stir well and correct the taste, if the taste is right when pouring cornstarch solution, stir well- Add sausage and eggs, stir until smooth, remove and serve.

8. Meatball fried rice.



photo: Instagram / @ yulianatunggadewi_18

Ingredients: - 2 room temperature rice dishes - 2 green onion stems - 1 carrot, chopped korek - small pieces - 6 thinly cut meatballs - 2 eggs - 2 tablespoons soy sauce - 1.5 teaspoons salt - 2 teaspoons granulated sugar- 1/2 tsp ground pepper
Fine spices: - 2 cloves of garlic - 5 grains of red onion - 5 cayenne peppers according to taste
How to make: - Saute ground spices until fragrant, then add carrots, stir well, add eggs, then scrambled, add meatballs and mustard greens, stir well- add soy sauce, salt, sugar and pepper stir until cooked, just before it is cooked lift the chives, taste correction, lift and serve.

9. Stir-fried tempeh.



photo: Instagram/@resep.masakan_enak

Ingredients: - 1 papah tempe- A handful of basil - 3 grains of onion - 3 cloves of garlic - 3 seeds of red cayenne - Sweet soy sauce - Sugar and salt to taste
How to cook: - Dice the tempeh, fry it half dry - Saute the seasoning, add sugar and salt, add the tempeh, stir evenly - Add the basil and sweet soy sauce - Cook until the seasoning is evenly distributed.

10. Shrimp paste.



photo: Instagram/@masak.menu_sehat

Ingredients: - 7 red curly chilies - 7 green curly chilies - 5 red cayenne peppers - 5 green cayenne peppers - 3 red onions - 2 cloves of garlic - 1/2 red tomatoes - 1/2 pieces of shrimp paste - Salt and sugar to taste - Lime juice to taste- Cooking oil to taste
How to cook: - Saute all the chili paste ingredients until they are enough. Transfer the chilli ingredients to the ulekan, add a little used oil for sautéing- Ulek the chilli ingredients to taste- Add salt and sugar, taste correction- Finally add the lime juice.

11. Cah spinach meatballs.



photo: Instagram/@video.resepmasakan

Ingredients: - 1 bunch of spinach - 5 beef meatballs - 1 tomato
Coarse uleg spices: - 4 cloves of garlic - 1 grain of candlenut - 10 pieces of cayenne pepper or according to taste
Additional: - Oyster sauce - Flavoring mushroom - Salt
How to cook: - Pick water spinach, wash it clean and drain it - Meatballs like it like - Heat cooking oil then saute uleg spices and chopped tomatoes until fragrant then add kale and baso, saute quickly season the oyster sauce, flavor the mushrooms with a little salt, pour enough hot water to taste , stir fry evenly, taste test - Serve.

12. Sweet and spicy shrimp.



photo: Instagram / @ galerimasakanindonesia

Ingredients: - 600 gr shrimp, peel the skin - 2 cloves of garlic - 1 onion - 2 red curly chilies - 2 curly green chilies - 1 leek, take the leaves only Ingredients: - 2 tablespoons chili sauce - 4 tablespoons of tomato sauce - 1 tablespoon saori oyster sauce - 1 1/2 tablespoons sweet soy sauce - To taste salt - Secubit pepper
How to cook: - Clean the shrimp, remove the skin and head- Finely slice garlic, chopped onion- Prepare fire, saute garlic and onion until fragrant then add shrimp stir-fried shrimp until it changes color- Add all ingredients of sauce, salt and pepper. Once almost cooked, add the slices of red, green chili and chives. Mix well and correct taste. Serve.

13. Cah Tge Tofu Salted Fish.



photo: Instagram / @ indoresepgram

Ingredients: - Long bean sprouts - Long beans - White tofu - Leeks - Salted fish - Beef settings - Mushroom broth - Pepper - Oyster sauce - Granulated sugar
Sliced seasoning: - 4 onions - 3 cloves of garlic - 5 red cayenne peppers - 1 red tomato
How to cook: - Fried tofu that has been diced half-cooked, set aside- Continue by frying salted fish, set aside- Saute the seasoning slices until fragrant then add the beef cows, tofu and long beans- May add just a little water- Give seasonings like pepper, broth mushrooms, oyster sauce and granulated sugar- Finally add the sprouts, anchovies and scallions, cook briefly then remove from heat and serve.

14. Sweet cabbage mustard greens.



photo: Instagram/@menu.harini

Ingredients: - 1 bunch or about 6 stalks of mustard greens, cut into pieces - 1 sweet corn, shaved - 3 cloves of minced garlic - 1 tbsp fine ebi - To taste often chili slices - Sugar, salt and powdered broth to taste - Water to taste
How to cook: - Saute garlic and ebi until fragrant, add chili, corn and water- Wait until the corn is tender / sufficiently cooked- Add mustard greens, add salt sugar and powdered broth- Stir well wait for mustard greens, turn off the stove- Serve in bowl / plate.

15. Jontor cob.



photo: Instagram/@masak.menu_sehat

Ingredients: - Tuna, fry briefly - 2 cm ginger, geprek - 2 bay leaves - 2 pieces of leeks, slices - Salt, sugar, broth to taste - Water cup of water
Smooth spices: - 10 cloves of onion - 8 cloves of garlic - 10 large red chilies - 10 curly red chilies - 30 red cayenne peppers - 1 tomato
How to cook: - Saute ground spices, ginger, chives, bay leaves until fragrant. After that, season with salt, sugar and broth. Taste test - After the seasoning is felt just right, insert the cob and a cup of water. Stir well. Cook until the water has receded and the spices have seeped in. Remove and serve.

16. Soy Eggplant.



photo: Instagram/@resep.masakan.sayur

Ingredients: - 500 grams of fresh eggplant, discard the washing stems and cut into pieces - 50 grams of dried teri teri fried field - 1 geprek galangal segment - 1 sheet of orange leaf - 1 tablespoon oyster sauce - 2 tablespoons soy sauce - Sugar, salt, and mushroom flavoring, to taste- Water to taste- Oil to saute sufficiently
Sliced seasoning: - 5 large cloves of garlic - 7 large onions - 20 cayenne pepper / according to taste - 2 large red chilies - 2 large green chilies - 1 tomato
How to cook: - Sauté the sliced seasoning with galangal and lime leaves until fragrant, add the eggplant and add a little water- Give oyster sauce, sweet soy sauce, sugar, salt, flavoring, cook until eggplant wilts / cooked- Towards being appointed enter the anchovies, stir well taste correction. turn off and serve.

17. Eggplant sambal teri pete.



photo: Instagram/@resep.masakan.sayur

Ingredients: - 1 young eggplant - Petai to taste - Fried anchovies to taste - Salt and sugar to taste
Fine ingredients: - 5 grains of red onion - 2 cloves of garlic - 5 pieces of red chili - 3 pieces of cayenne pepper - 1 tsp fiber creme - 1/2 tbsp dried shrimp soak first
How to cook: - Clean the eggplant into 4 parts - Heat a lot of oil until it is really hot, fry the eggplant for a while, remove the drain - Heat a little oil in a pan, stir fry the delicate ingredients until fragrant, then add salt and sugar to taste- Add bananas and eggplant stir briefly lift- Sprinkle fried anchovies serve while hot.

18. Savory crispy shrimp.



photo: Instagram / @ resepudang

Ingredients: - 450 gr shrimp - 1 tablespoon full fiber creme - 100 gr versatile flour - 3 tablespoons cornstarch - 1 egg white - 2 cloves of grated garlic - Pepper, salt to taste - Cooking oil
How to cook: - Clean the shrimp, leave the tail split back and wipe the poop - Stir the shrimp thoroughly with garlic, pepper and a little salt marinated for 30 minutes - Beat the egg whites add 2 tablespoons of ice water and fiber creme - Mix the versatile flour and cornstarch - Roll the shrimp in thin flour only, then dip in beaten eggs and then roll again in flour with a little knead, do it until finished, then fry in hot oil over medium heat until golden brown- Lift and drain- Serve with chili sauce.

19. Egg chili.



photo: Instagram / @ resepkreasirakyat

Ingredients: - 4 pieces of chicken eggs, boiled cooked and fried until skinned
Ingredients (chopped coarse): - 2 cloves of garlic - 8 grains of red onion - 2 large red chilies - 10 pieces of cayenne pepper
Other ingredients: - 1 sheet of orange leaf, remove the bones - 1 sliced tomato - 1/2 tsp cooked shrimp paste - Sugar, salt, powdered broth to taste
How to make: - Saute the chili sauce with shrimp paste and orange leaves until fragrant and cooked, add enough water- Add the eggs and sliced tomatoes, season with sugar, salt and powdered broth, taste correction, cook until the gravy sauce-Sprinkle leeks, ready to be served .

20. Saute the oyster mushrooms.



photo: Instagram/@menu.harini

Ingredients: - 200 grams of oyster mushrooms - 5 strands of long beans, cut into slices - 4 cloves of garlic, finely chopped - Enough water - Oil for sauteing
Seasonings: - Salt- Sugar- Mushroom flavoring
How to cook: - Heat the oil in a pan, saute garlic until fragrant- Add long beans, saute briefly, add the oyster mushrooms then saute again. Give a little water.- Enter the seasoning (the size is adjusted to each taste). Stir well. Then test the Sauté for a few moments. Turn off the heat. Lift and serve with warm rice.
